name: Last Regards
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
As a response to a creature within range dying, you reanimate their spirit to continue the battle. It returns to maximum hit points and takes its turn after yours.

The reanimated creature loses one-quarter of its maximum hit points at the end of each of its turns. Its spirit vanishes when reduced to 0 hit points.

You can't target the same creature with this spell again.
